title: Which character by Enid Blyton do you like more in The Five Find-Outers series, Bets or Daisy? State at least 1 point (more if you want) to justify your answer. - Quora
tags: The Five Find-Outers and Dog (book series) by Enid Blyton

response.answer_text: I personally like Bets more of course, because she is the curious, good natured and pleasant girl. of course, she is much cuter, being the youngest, and in the stories, is set up to be the second primary character after Fredrick.
